#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#define ULL unsigned long long 
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i =(a); i<=(b);i++)
#define REP(i,n) FOR(i,0,n-1)
#define PB(a) push_back(a)
#define SZ(a) ((int)a.size())
#define MIN(a,b) (a>b?b:a)
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
 
		string str;
		cin>>str;
		//cout<<str<<"\n";
		ULL n2,n5,n;
		vector<ULL> mul;
		n2=n5=0;
		n=0;
		bool flag = true;
		REP(i,SZ(str))
		{
			if(str[i]>='0' && str[i]<='9')
			{
				n*=10;
				n+= str[i]-'0';
			}
			else
			{
				if(n==0)
				{
					flag=false;
					break;
				}
				while(n%2==0)
				{
					n2++;
					n/=2;
				}
				while(n%5==0)
				{
					n5++;
					n/=5;
				}
				mul.PB(n);
		//		cout<<"n entered is "<<n<<"\n";
				n=0;
			}
		}
		if(n==0 || flag==false)
		{
			cout<<"Robot hanged.\n";
			continue;
		}
		
		while(n%2==0)
		{
			n2++;
			n/=2;
		}
		while(n%5==0)
		{
			n5++;
			n/=5;
		}
		mul.PB(n);
			
		ULL ans=1;
		REP(i,SZ(mul))
		{
			int digit = mul[i]%10;
			ans*= digit;
			ans%=10;
		}
		
		
	//	REP(i,SZ(mul))
	//	cout<<mul[i]<<"\n";
		
		
		ULL aa = MIN(n2,n5);
	//	cout<<aa<<" "<<n2<<" "<<n5<<"\n";
		n2-=aa;
		n5-=aa;
	
		FOR(i,1,n2)
		{
			ans*=2;
			ans%=10;
		}
		FOR(i,1,n5)
		{
			ans*=5;
			ans%=10;
		}
		printf("%llu\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
